biotools.summary: Unsupervised and database-independent analysis workflow for metaproteomic MS/MS data using spectrum clustering. It clusters all experimentally observed MS/MS spectra based on their spectral similarity and create a representative consensus spectrum for each cluster by using the spectrum clustering algorithm implemented in the spectral library search engine, SpectraST.

bioschemas.name: metaSpectraST
